participant_1.background:
I don't dye my hair.
I am single and live with my dog, who is a great listener.
my family came from greece in the 1950s.
ferrari is my favorite car company.
I want a home in a quiet area where I can focus on my art.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag to my friends about my delicious home grown vegetables.
i am a cat person.
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, because it helps me to stay positive and focused on raising my sons.
i like to create art.
I bought a book for myself and my cats to read together.

content.text: Hi! What's your favorite thing to do?
I love to create art! What about you?
I also love to create art! I also love to garden and cook.
Me too! I love to grow my own vegetables. It's so rewarding to be able to eat food that you've grown yourself.
I agree! It's so much fun to see how your plants grow and change over time.
I love the smell of fresh-grown vegetables in the summer. It's so amazing!
Me too! It's one of my favorite smells.
What kind of art do you like to create?
I love to paint and draw. I also love to make sculptures.
That's amazing! I would love to see some of your art sometime.
Great! I'd love to see your art
